title: Completed PE Summary - Silver Quest
raw_html:
Category Fishing
Type: Fishing vessel
Construction: Wooden
Length overall: 60ft
Date & Time 30/09/04
Incident Type: Floundering
Persons onboard: 3 crew
Injuries/ fatalities: None
Damage/ Pollution: Vessel lost

Synopsis

The 60ft wooden fishing vessel Silver Quest II flooded and sank at 2300 on 30 September 2004.The Skipper and two crewmembers had left the vessel for another fishing vessel which had come alongside earlier.

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector of Marine Accidents wrote to:

The skipper and the owner of the vessel, recommending them to follow the guidance given in MGN 165(F) Fishing vessels: The Risk of Flooding
